channel.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
channel.description:
Title should be self-evident. I'm looking for sounds that produce the chorus sound effect. I know @TC64 was compiling a list of all the sounds and their potential uses, but I am not sure if he ever finished them.
I'm trying to experiment with some more synthwavey type sounds, so if anyone could help I'd greatly appreciate it

item.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
i know it sounds so cool (the tone automation)

Read full topic
item.source: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?

item.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
oh right lmao. Basically Chorus thickens a sound. its kinda like a harmonizer or adding harmonic distortion (kinda). it adds extra harmonics for a fuller sound and the added harmonics have subtle pitch movements. Depth effects how much the pitch variation is and mix decides how much wet is going in, also ammount is self explanatory but just in case, its the bit that adds the harmonics: the higher the amount the more harmonics

there are other features to it i just dont know exactly what they do cause i dont care about the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?

item.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Ah. I know what stereo is I just wasn’t entirely sure of the Chorus effect and what it did

Read full topic
item.source: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?

item.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
lmao stereo is pretty much what ear you are hearing stuff in, ie a sound can be mostly or entirely playing in the left ear and same with the right ear. Stereo basically duplicates the sound and plays it in both ears so it sounds like the sound is coming from both directions. they Play at different times (to put it simply - otherwise known as phase cancelation even so thats only slightly) to create this effect

you can simiulate this using panning (pan) but chorus also has this feature. I often do this when layering sounds, especially my basses, just adds a bit more of a professional feal and standard.

Also mono is where the sound is playing in both ears at the same time so it sounds like its in one spot

Read full topic
item.source: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?

item.title: Which Auxy sounds feature a chorus effect?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
http://testtone.com/fundamentals/what-chorus-effect

I don’t mean a sound that sounds like a choir xD I mean an effect that simulates a chorus fx like on a guitar. This is a classic 80’s effect that is common in synthwave songs @therealejoc @Lex

Read full topic
